memberdef.argsstring: (char *vehicleRegistration, int userNif, int timeInMinutes, VehicleList *vehicleList, UserList *userList, RentList **rentList)
memberdef.name: createRent

detaileddescription.para: This function creates a new rent with the given vehicle registration, user NIF, and time in minutes. It also checks if the user and vehicle exist and if the vehicle is available. If any of these conditions are not met, the function returns NULL. Otherwise, it creates a new rent and returns it.

parameterdescription.para: The registration of the vehicle to be rented
The NIF of the user renting the vehicle
The time in minutes the vehicle will be rented for

simplesect.para: A pointer to the newly created rent, or NULL if any of the conditions are not met

briefdescription.para: Creates a new node in the rent list.

detaileddescription.para: This function creates a new node in the rent list with the given rent. It returns true if the node was successfully created, or false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the rent list
The rent to be added to the list

simplesect.para: True if the node was successfully created, or false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: This function prints the rent list, showing the ID, vehicle registration, user NIF, and time in minutes for each rent in the list.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the rent list

briefdescription.para: Deletes a rent from the rent list.

detaileddescription.para: This function deletes a rent from the rent list with the given ID and vehicle registration. It also changes the availability of the vehicle to true. It returns true if the rent was successfully deleted, or false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the rent list
The ID of the rent to be deleted
The registration of the vehicle to be returned

simplesect.para: True if the rent was successfully deleted, or false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Counts the number of rents in the rent list.

detaileddescription.para: This function counts the number of rents in the rent list and returns the count.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the rent list

simplesect.para: The number of rents in the rent list

briefdescription.para: Edits a rent in the rent list.

detaileddescription.para: This function edits a rent in the rent list with the given ID. It replaces the rent with the given rent parameter. It returns true if the rent was successfully edited, or false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the rent list
The ID of the rent to be edited
The new rent to replace the old one

simplesect.para: True if the rent was successfully edited, or false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Stores the rents in a binary file.

detaileddescription.para: This function stores the rents in a binary file named "rents.bin" in the "saved-data" directory. It returns true if the rents were successfully stored, or false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the head node of the rent list

simplesect.para: True if the rents were successfully stored, or false otherwise

briefdescription.para: File containing the functions to manage the rentals.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains the implementation of functions to manage the rentals, such as creating a new rent, creating a rent list, printing the rent list, deleting a rent, counting the number of rents, editing a rent, and storing the rents in a binary file.
